answers.author: Jared Cobb
answers.text:
Yes, the City of The Dalles, Oregon has one underpass and is planning for a second. I'm sure their city manager, Nolan Young, would be glad to share his experience with you. 
Nolan Young
City Manager
The Dalles, OR
541-296-5481 
nyoung@ci.the-dalles.or.us

author: Carl Schwing
text: My city has just completed a shell path (trail), stopping at the right of way line of the Interstate Highway.  We wish to connect under the highway overpass to another portion of the trail.  We are hearing that getting approval to do this (especially since 9-11) may almost take an act of God!  Is anyone aware about where the feds may have granted such permission in the past and under what conditions?
title: Connecting city trail under Insterstate highway
